name: Tyranitar
author: Satoshi Shirai
flavor_text: If it ramages, it knocks down mountains and buries rivers. Maps must be redrawn afterward.

abilities.name: Raging Roar
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may attach 1 {D} Energy from your discard pile to this Pokémon for each Prize card your opponent has taken.

attacks.name: Dark Mountain
attacks.effect: Discard the top 2 cards of your deck. This attack does 50 more damage for each Supporter card discard in this way.
